meanings.definition: A thick flat-woven rug or carpet used in India.
meanings.sent1: The dhurrie added warmth to the room with its colorful patterns.
meanings.sent2: She bought a dhurrie to decorate her living room floor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the dhurrie was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The dhurrie was a magic carpet transporting her to faraway lands in her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the dhurrie told stories of ancient traditions.
